title: What I want
content: Professionally, my main goal is to be a successful `videogame developer`. Currently I am working on little projects to learn theory and best practices on C++ and videogame deveopment in general. I am very interested on design and keeping my code clean, efficient and flexible, so I focus on good practices and programming patterns.
Personally, the struggle that matters most to me is `environmentalism`. I grew up in the countryside and have always been connected to nature, so I am deeply concerned about protecting it.
I support other social causes, but I don't want to bore you `:P`
